channel.title: Pages on My Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on My Blog

item.title: About Me
item.description: Since high school I’ve been fascinated with programming and all things IT. I was fortunate to have some great teachers that taught me a lot of basics. I learned how to program first in Turbo Pascal, later Delphi. I learned about Turing machines and databases (SQL). I ended up studying chemistry, but the computational chemistry courses introduced me to python which I started using for all kinds of tasks. I also learned some LaTeX and wrote my Master’s as well as PhD thesis in LaTex.
